long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of sticky navbars stealing precious screen space? Feel like they're more of a constant irritant than a handy tool? We felt the same way. Hence, we developed 'Let Me See The Page'.

With 'Let Me See The Page', you can finally reclaim control of your screen. Say goodbye to scrolling disruptions and hello to a pure web surfing experience. We believe that your screen is your domain, and no sticky navbar should encroach upon it. 

And if you still need the navbar. Hover over the top area and it will appear, just like before.
